can anyone of you confirm, that this crack/loader works for other commentary languages than english, french or spanish (mexico) WITHOUT origin? I always get a CTD + Crashdump when trying to start a match with other languages ...
Truthy yes i confirm that crack does not work with other languages, I trying to start the game with polish commentary but game crashes so i using original comentary and polish text.

finally ... I got the loader to work with all other languages! the problem was that it only works with a mod/different/bigger data7.big + data7.sh file. Filesize 168 mb instead of 160 mb.

detailled instructions + dl-links can be found here:
http://www.soccergaming.com/forums/showpost.php?p=3311149&postcount=100

to sum up you have to:
1. copy/replace all the commentary languages you want in your fifa Game folder - normally 4 files per language (example: ger_de.bh, ger_de.big, german_de.bh, german_de.big) 
if you have the multi12 version they might already be installed idk (if not just mount the iso & replace the files)
and if you like me have the Reloaded-Internal-Version (Multi3/5/6 whatever version) you can find single commentary-language dl-links here atm (hotfile mirror): http://ddlgratuit.com/fifa-13-patch/fifa-13-commentaries/fifa-13-language-commentary-files.html
2. get the total commentary mod by doctor+ modified/bigger data7.big/sh from the soccergaming forum-link/Skydrive (I didn't find it anywhere else): http://www.soccergaming.com/forums/showpost.php?p=3311149&postcount=100
3. I don't know if this step is really necessary - however it doesn't hurt either especially if you don't have the reloaded-version:
- get FHL-BH-Editor from here: http://editing.myfhl.de/FHL-BH-Editor/ddet/id/10
- open the programm (it should automatically dectect your game folder etc) and click on regenerate all bh-files (+ext) then close it
3. run the game and select the commentary language you want ingame. Now it should work without any crashed whatsoever - excepct the fifa related ones. LOL
and yes, all this works WITHOUT that origin crap.
